      • isLeap

        public static boolean isLeap​(int year)
        This method checks if an year is a leap year or not
        Parameters:
        year - int, inputs year to test
        Returns:
        returns true if year is leap year

      • checkformat

        public static boolean checkformat​(java.lang.String date1,
                                  java.lang.String date2)
        This method checks whether the given date is in the correct format or not
        Parameters:
        date1 - String, start date
        date2 - String, end date
        Returns:
        returns true if the given date is in the correct format

      • getDayNumber

        public static int getDayNumber​(java.lang.String date)
        This method returns the number of the week as an integer with 3 added on so it can be easily used to access days in hotels.csv
        Parameters:
        date - String, date in dd-mm-yyyy
        Returns:
        returns day of the week as an integer from Sun - Sat and adds 3

      • getLocalDate

        public static java.lang.String getLocalDate()
        This method returns todays date as a String in the dd-mm-yyyy format
        Returns:
        todays date

      • checkVacancy

        public static boolean checkVacancy​(java.lang.String roomType,
                                   java.lang.String checkin,
                                   java.lang.String checkout)
        This method checks every date between 2 given dates, then compares and checks if there are existing reservations for the given room types and dates that fall between the two given dates. It increments each day locally til its gone through the entire reservations.csv file if any of these days exceed the maximum rooms from hotels.csv it returns false otherwise it returns true
        Parameters:
        roomType - String, type of room to be checked
        checkin - String, start date
        checkout - String, end date
        Returns:
        true if a room is available for reservation, else false
